## Bee.updateTag() method

Update tag's total chunks count.

This is important if you are uploading individual chunks with a tag. Then upon finishing the final root chunk, you can use this method to update the total chunks count for the tag.

**Signature:**

```typescript
updateTag(tagUid: number | Tag, reference: Reference | string, options?: BeeRequestOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

tagUid


</td><td>

number \| [Tag](./bee-js-docs-project.tag.md)


</td><td>

UID or tag object to be retrieved


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

reference


</td><td>

[Reference](./bee-js-docs-project.reference.md) \| string


</td><td>

The root reference that contains all the chunks to be counted


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[BeeRequestOptions](./bee-js-docs-project.beerequestoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Options that affects the request behavior


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

TypeError if tagUid is in not correct format

BeeResponse error if something went wrong on the Bee node side while deleting the tag.
